data.title: Click & Collect West
meta_keywords: click collect retail grocer technology logistics supply chain strategy conference event terrapinn online ecommerce mcommerce commerce in store collection
data.meta_description: Alex Golshan - A conference that brings together grocers and retailers to network, learn from each other, and discuss the latest click and collect developments.
data.text:
Alex Golshan is currently VP of Omni-Channel and Global eCommerce at BCBG Max Azria Group, where he is focused on expanding BCBGâs global eCommerce presence and innovations that focus on extending customer engagement, serving customers better and provide a seamless brand presence across channels. Â Previous to that, Alex architected Omni-channel strategies at Guitar Center that more than doubled on-line revenues. Â Before Guitar Center, Alex held positions as GM/VP of Multi-Channel Products at GERS (Escalate Retail), VP of Product Management & Development at Evant (now Manhattan Associates), and other management positions at Blue Martini Software, Enrst & Young Center for Technology Enablement and Price Waterhouse.

His specialties include seamless customer experience, eCommerce and Omni-Channel strategies and innovations for dramatic revenue growth.
